title: Bugsplat
body: Riot please get your life together and patch this bugsplat issue. Every single ranked or unranked game today is met with endless bugsplats during loading. I have already repaired the client. Come out with a patch and fix this issue. It is getting ridiculous.

replies.body: This could be caused for several reasons like outdated drivers, settings, or something else.  Repairing would fix up corrupt game files, so if it didn't resolve the issue then it may be something else.  Go over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) guide to help rule out possibilities and get this fixed up.  Let me know if you still have any issues!

I have updated drivers, added rules to firewall to allow the game, uninstalled and reinstalled, repaired the game. got rid of any trace of adobe air and updated my computer to the latest windows version. I do not know what else to do. Sort of throwing the towel for league at this point.

Hit us up in a [support ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)so our tech team can dig into this.  I suggest downloading the  [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) in order to gather a set of logs for better context.  We'll respond asap!

I had tried everything on the game crash guide twice over, which was the main reason I was frustrated. The solution I found wasn't actually on that page. I found the Hextech Repair tool link on an old forum post.

I've been playing for over 5 years, and have had very consistant service from them. Up until yesterday when I too got a bug splat error message. Right after champ select, right before loading screen. I tried repairing, reinstalling, all sorts of different tips from YouTube. Nothing has worked.

Riot really needs to work on it's tech support.

Although I recommend not going into ranked but instead starting a custom by yourself when trying to troubleshoot a bug splat.

It is a nightmare and I just want it to go away.

I'd like to help and get you back in game!  Troubleshooting in a custom game is a great idea, and there are a few steps that can be taken to get this resolved.  I recommend going over our game crash guide first to rule out several issues with game files, drivers, etc.  Let me know your results!

Sorry I took so long to get back to you, but I managed to find a solution. I found a link to the Hextech Repair Tool and did a clean uninstall and reinstall with that. Now League is running better than it did before, oddly enough.
OMFG YES I WAS 94 LP AND COULDNT EVEN GET INTO A GAME BEACUE OF BUGSPLAT AND I WENT DOWN TO 74 LP LIKE WTF RIOT GET YOUR FUCKING SHIT TOGETHER. Damn

So that bugsplat issue demoted me. As well as will not fix itself now that I have tried the repair option and have reinstalled the client. At the point of considering quitting this game and going to play different mobas. You guys constantly have issues with staying connected.
